full_text: The price of cobalt has nearly doubled since January as the electric-vehicle boom gathers pace. Meeting the demand will not be easy https://t.co/2r90rJqhFV

localize.full_text: 自1月份以来，随着电动汽车热潮的加快，钴的价格几乎翻了一番。满足需求并非易事https://t.co/2r90rJqhFV。
